original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1216)@</color>以 <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Int(481)@</color> <color=#13ccd7>智力</color>對自身範圍內敵方造成法術傷害，並在 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(4736)@</color> 秒內降低全體敵方 <color=#ccffcc>4</color> 點移動速度以及攻擊頻率。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1216)@</color> to <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Int(481)@</color><color=#13ccd7>Int</color> inflicts spell damage on enemies within its range, and reduces all enemies within <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(4736)@</color> within seconds <color=#ccffcc>4 </color> Point movement speed and attack frequency.
